name: Flamefists
description1: Smoke Bomb: Place a -50 accuracy mantle [0 pips]
description2: Conflagration: Deal a 150, 3 turn DoT and clear a shield to summon a minion [1 pip]
description3: Flame Burst: Deal 150 damage and detonate if your team has a minion [2 pips]
description4: Thermodynamics: Place a 75, 3 turn DoT on self for a 200, 4 turn HoT [2 pips]
description5: Scouring Inferno: Deal a 225, 3 turn DoT to all enemies [4 pips]
description6: Fire Blast: Deal 250 damage to all enemies and detonate if your team has a minion [5 pips]
description7: Sacrificial Flame: Sacrifice minion to gift 125 shield to all teammates and remove a shield from all enemies [3 pips]
description8: Full Steam: Gift a pip and clear a trap for a pip for self [0 pips]
description9: Fire and Smoke: Deal 225, 3 turn DoT on enemy and place a -50 accuracy mantle if enemy team has a minion [2 pips]
description10: Pyrodynamics: Take 200 damage to self for a 225, 3 turn DoT for all enemies and a 200, 3 turn HoT for all teammates [4 pips]

name: Frostcrag
description1: Shielded Beetle: Deal 50 damage and clear blade for 100 shield on self [0 pips]
description2: Aegis of Artemis: Place a 100 shield and a stun block [0 pips]
description3: Sleet Snake: Deal 50 damage or 125 damage if you have a shield / trap [1 pip]
description4: Armory of Artemis: Place 200 shields and a stun block on whole team [3 pips]
description5: Snowswarm: Deal 150 damage and place a 125 trap if enemy has a trap [3 pips]
description6: Cold-Fired Phoenix: Deal 150 damage to all enemies or 350 damage if you have a shield / trap [6 pips]
description7: Scrap Trap: Place a 100 shield and remove a trap [0 pips]
description8: Blue Moon Bird: Deal 200 damage and clear blade for 2 pips to self [4 pips]
description9: Iceheart Kraken: Deal 150 damage and place a 200 trap if enemy has a trap [6 pips]

name: Thunderwalker
description1: Electrify: Place a 50 blade and remove a DoT [0 pips]
description2: Sound and Fury: Taunt for 2 turns [0 pips]
description3: System Shock: Deal 150 damage and stun if your HP less than 50% [2 pips]
description4: Chaotic Currents: Deal 225 damage and gain a 150, 3 turn HoT if your HP less than 50% [3 pips]
description5: Snap, Kraken, Pop: Deal 300 damage [4 pips]
description6: Super Storm: Deal 250 damage to all enemies or 350 damage if you have a HoT [5 pips]
description7: Neural Shock: Stun enemy and deal 50 damage if enemy has a trap [1 pip]
description8: Gathering Storm: Place a 200 blade and clear mantle for a 100 blade (Does not Stack) [2 pips]
description9: Elven Bolt: Deal 150 damage and place a dispel if your HP is less than 50% [2 pips]
description10: Ferrous Tyrant: Deal 250 damage to all enemies and stun enemies if your HP is less than 50% [5 pips]

name: Graxus
description1: Brazen Strike: Deal 50 damage and summon a minion or taunt if you already have a minion [0 pips]
description2: Grim Gambit: Place a 100 trap and taunt for 2 turns if you have a shield [1 pip]
description3: Raise Banner: Place a double pip, 3 turn bubble for a minion [1 pip]
description4: Heavy Charge: Deal a 250, 5 turn DoT and steal an enemy shield [2 pips]
description5: Hold Fast: Place a 150 trap on all enemies, turns into 200 trap if you have taunt active [3 pips]
description6: Flank Sweep: Deal a 300, 4 turn DoT on all enemies and steal enemy shield [5 pips]
description7: Envelop: Place a 200 trap and gain a 100 shield if enemy has taunt active [2 pips]
description8: Fierce Rally: Push a shield and gain a 75 shield if you have taunt active [0 pips]
description9: To The Last: Place afterlife that gives rest of team a 200 shield [3 pips]
description10: Total War: Deal 150 damage to all enemies and a 150, 3 turns if your team has a minion [4 pips]

name: Graniteheart
description1: Benevolent Bat: Deal 50 damage and gain a pip if enemy is a minion [0 pips]
description2: Dark Protector: Intercept all damage directed at teammates for 2 turns [0 pips]
description3: Beastmoon Brownie: Place a 150, 3 turn HoT and clear a DoT for a 75, 3 turn HoT on self [1 pip]
description4: Infectious Worm: Deal 150 damage and push a DoT onto enemy [2 pips]
description6: Spider Swarm: Deal 200 damage to all enemies and add a 200, 4 turn DoT if enemy has a DoT [5 pips]
description7: Kaboom!: Push DoT to enemy and detonate it [0 pips]
description8: Spry Satyr: Place a 250, 5 turn HoT on whole team [4 pips]
description9: Spirit Spider: Deal 225 damage and place afterlife that heals own team by 50 if enemy is minion [3 pips]
description10: Revivify: Place afterlife that gives rest of team double pips for 2 turns [0 pips]

name: Gravestone
description1: Life Transfer: Steal 25 HP from enemy for yourself [0 pips]
description2: Skillful Strike: Deal 75 damage or 125 damage if you have a shield [1 pip]
description3: Ride And Die: Deal 150 damage or clear blade for 225 damage [2 pips]
description4: Deathproofing: Place a 150 weakness on enemy and gain a 75 shield if you have a blade [2 pips]
description5: Deathbringer: Place a -125 heal mantle on all enemies or clear HoT for -175 heal mantle [3 pips]
description6: Grim Troll: Deal 200 damage to all enemies or 275 damage if you have a shield [5 pips]
description7: Mortis' Malaise: Steal blade then steal 50 HP from enemy [1 pip]
description8: Woe Toad: Deal 150 damage to all enemies or clear blade for 225 damage [4 pips]
description9: Red Deathish: Place a 50 weakness and steal blade from enemy [0 pips]
description10: Undying: Place afterlife that steals 50 HP from each opponent [1 pip]
